title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.11 - Amicus curiae briefs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.11 - Amicus curiae briefs

State Regulations
(a) Permission to file an amicus curiae
brief shall be obtained by persons who are not parties to the action or
proceeding by motion on notice to each of the parties. (b) Unless otherwise ordered
by the court, oral argument is not permitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
670.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
